blacklist.conf -> /etc/modprobe.d/blacklist.conf
cron/* -> /var/spool/cron/*
custom -> /etc/sudoers.d/custom
events/* -> /etc/acpi/events/*
fstab -> /etc/fstab
pacman.conf -> /etc/pacman.conf
powertop.service -> /etc/systemd/system/powertop.service
username.conf -> /etc/systemd/system/transmission.service.d/username.conf
xorg.conf.d/* -> /etc/X11/xorg.conf.d/*
chrome/* -> $HOME/.mozilla/firefox/<profile>/chrome/*
10-monitor.conf -> /etc/X11/xorg.conf.d/10-monitor.conf # job dual monitors
logind.conf -> /etc/systemd/logind.conf
